Wyola! what you said!
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Card & Adventure Video Games: Monster Rancher Battlecard Episode II Archive (PSOne): Characters: Wyola! what you said!
By torey luvullo on Saturday, September 2, 2000 - 10:49 pm:

comes a point in the game where something a character says shocks me. in mr2, it was when pabs said "shut up! you fool!" while he and colt were waiting for the metalner aliens. in battlecards, it just now happened. was playing a practice match with wyola[the mr2 marketplace girl] and suddenly she looked at her hand and said "screw it! i'm going to make them all guts!"

wtg wyola!
